name: Moonlight thief Original Sound Track
detailed_description:
It's the Official Soundtrack of "Moonlight thief", in MP3's format.
20 tracks music by mayolazr and Karut.

  • Memory: 45 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6900 Series
